content.prompt: While some archaeologists have suggested that the colossal moai of Rapa Nui were moved using wooden sleds made from palm trees, scholars have theorized more recently that the moai were

choices.label: carved from stone megaliths already on the site
moved while standing upright with a system of ropes and levers
dragged to their locations by domesticated animals and carts
assembled in place using the ashlar masonry technique

topic.text: 9.3: Theories and Interpretations of Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
